author: IBM Technology
description:
Ready to try Lag Llama for yourself? Find the code here → https://github.com/IBM/ibmdotcom-tutorials/blob/main/generative-ai/time-series-forecasting-lag-llama.ipynb
Learn more about LAG Llama here → https://www.ibm.com/think/tutorials/lag-llama

Forecasting the future just got a whole lot more precise! Join Meredith Mante as she takes you on a deep dive into Lag Llama, an open-source foundation model, and shows you how to harness its power for time series forecasting. Learn how to load and preprocess data, train a model, and evaluate its performance, gaining a deeper understanding of how to leverage Lag Llama for accurate predictions.

 AI news moves fast. Sign up for a monthly newsletter for AI updates from IBM → https://www.ibm.com/account/reg/us-en/signup?formid=news-urx-52120

#ai #machinelearning #deeplearning
title: Time Series Forecasting with Lag Llama
